nodes.text: Ziro's Palace was the nightclub that served as the personal residence and lair of Hutt crime lord Ziro Desilijic Tiure. Located in the lower levels of Coruscant's Federal District and built along a wall of the Aradonti Ravine, it was a rare Hutt-owned business so far from Hutt Space. It had a giant marquee upon the entrance and was covered in advertisements and was frequented by a powerful political clientele with whom Ziro had forged connections. It also served as the headquarters for his criminal organization.
